channel.title: [RUNESOURCE] Some easy questions/problems to fix
channel.description:
I have some questions/problems
1) I managed to finish Duel Arena. Although, when the player defeats the other, it sends the loser back (because he died) and it shows the spoils interface, but it doesn't send the victor back to the Duel Arena lobby.
2) Where can I get a music ID list? (#377 Revision) (Example Song ID 1 is Harmony I believe).
3) How would I add a cutscene? (For a quest) (It pans across the screen, not allowing player movement, or chat).

item.title: [RUNESOURCE] Some easy questions/problems to fix
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

  1. You’re not sending the correct text to the client.
  2. Unpack the cache and look through it.
  3. As in, you make a cut scene? If I recall there are a few server -> client packets that make the client shake/freeze and such. Look into them.

Read full topic
